name: Brubnar the Barbarian in the Deepest Dungeon
name_original: Brubnar the Barbarian in the Deepest Dungeon
description:
Go forth with courage, Brubnar! And know that as you go deeper and deeper, so grows the danger! Play through endless floors of escalating challenge as Brubnar the Barbarian! Get deep with the mystical Wordes of Wisdome! Rack up gold and spend it on powerful upgrades and magic spells!

This is my compo entry for Ludum Dare 48, so it was created in under 48 hours. The theme was "Deeper and Deeper." I hope you enjoy the random deep quote generator.
